trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Azure has two different deployment models for creating and working with resources: [Resource Manager and classic](../resource-manager-deployment-model.md).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Azure has two different deployment models for creating and working with resources: [Resource Manager and classic](../resource-manager-deployment-model.md).

trans-unit.source: This article covers using the classic deployment model.
trans-unit.target: This article covers using the classic deployment model.
